segments.text: No , the steak was recommended , but it is not very fresh .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ! Sorry to hear that . This is quite unusual as we have steak from the market every day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what ? It is not fresh and I'm not happy about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir . Do you wish to try something else ? That would be on the house , of course .
segments.speaker: S1
